original_text: And the captain of the guard took Seraiah the chief priest and Zephaniah the second priest and the three keepers of the threshold;
korean_text: 시위대장이 대제사장 스라야와 부제사장 스바냐와 성전 문지기 세 사람을 사로잡고

sentences.original_text: And the captain of the guard took Seraiah the chief priest
and the three keepers of the threshold
